message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000. What are your thoughts?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I'm interested, I'm looking to spend closer to $10000 for this product.  Is there any wiggle room in your price?
I understand that you're looking to spend $10000, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11500. This is my best offer at this time. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. $11500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to consider $11000? It's a fair price for both of us, and would allow us to close the deal.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you a price of $12250. This is my final compromise. What do you think?
